codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceConditionValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance Condition
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance condition value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms速  values  for values from the manifestation of reactions value set PLUS findings for the documentation of allergy or intolerances in conditions as problem-list or as encounter-diagnosis as well as its absence (no know allergies)

codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceReactionManifestationValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance Reaction Manifestation
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance reaction manifestation value set, including codes values according to the Allergy Reaction (GPS) - IPS value set from SNOMED Clinical Terms速  for the documentation of manifestation of allergy or intolerance reactions

codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceReactionSubstanceValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance Reaction Substance
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance reation substance value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 substances for the documentation of substancies of allergy or intolerance reactions

codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance coding value set. This value set includes codes values  from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 for no known [xy] allergies AND findings AND substances for the documentation of allergy or intolerance
